title: Pandorak2nd
author: Pandorak2nd
content: I'm just a newbie who wants to try to find out more about cryptocurrency, and by chance I found a suspicious message in my PM, I'm just trying to find out the truth of the platform. But why did the moderator ban me? where did i go wrong? are you so sleep deprived that you can't see reality, mod?This is my account: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3530840

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.created_time: January 25, 2023, 08:54:16 PMLast edit: January 25, 2023, 09:17:18 PM by The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Well, since it only took you a day to get banned, my guess (without knowing what the message you got was) is that you plagiarized something, did some serious spamming, or got caught evading a ban.  Are you so sleep deprived that you did one of those three things?Edit:Quote from: Mitchell on January 25, 2023, 09:01:37 PMMaybe check someone's post history on Ninjastic first before commenting.  Lol, c'mon you know I'm too damn lazy to do that, and I have so many sections on ignore that I couldn't see any of what OP posted.My humblest apologies, OP.  I'm having my period and it's making me a raging bitch.

comments.author: Mitchell
comments.created_time: January 25, 2023, 09:01:37 PMLast edit: January 25, 2023, 09:15:18 PM by Mitchell
comments.body: Hi, sorry. I added the link to my anti-spam bot after a few hours to preventing the link from being spammed by others, as I didn't expect you to post it again. That said, I set it to nuke an account instead of just removing the post, which is what happened when you quoted Lufa's post. I'll remove the link for now and reach out to the admins to get this resolved (as I cannot do so as a patroller).Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on January 25, 2023, 08:54:16 PMWell, since it only took you a day to get banned, my guess (without knowing what the message you got was) is that you plagiarized something, did some serious spamming, or got caught evading a ban.  Are you so sleep deprived that you did one of those three things?Maybe check someone's post history on Ninjastic first before commenting. In this case Pandorak means well

comments.author: Pandorak2nd
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on January 25, 2023, 08:54:16 PMWell, since it only took you a day to get banned, my guess (without knowing what the message you got was) is that you plagiarized something, did some serious spamming, or got caught evading a ban.  Are you so sleep deprived that you did one of those three things?Have you actually seen the post i posted earlier? i don't think I'm breaking any rules, instead, I'm trying to help people here. Guys, please help me @Helena Yu, @NeuroticFish.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Pandorak2nd on January 25, 2023, 09:03:27 PMGuys, please help me.Mitchell did tell you that he would contact an administrator to fix the problem and restore your account. You just have to wait a little while. By the way, the person you wrote about in your topic, who sent out PMs with a phishing link, has been banned.

comments.author: Mitchell
comments.body: Cyrus has unbanned your account Pandorak. I've asked them to restore your posts as well. Hope this resolves your issue. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for reporting that user.

comments.author: Pandorak
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on January 25, 2023, 09:15:38 PMBy the way, the person you wrote about in your topic, who sent out PMs with a phishing link, has been banned.Well, i knew that even before my account was banned, thanks Xal0lex.Quote from: Mitchell on January 25, 2023, 09:17:28 PMCyrus has unbanned your account Pandorak. I've asked them to restore your posts as well. Hope this resolves your issue. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for reporting that user.Thanks Mitchell, now i can make posts again even though the topic i made before is still missing, i hope it will recover soon too, and you're welcome. I'm glad to be at least a little useful to this forum.

comments.author: Mitchell
comments.body: Yes, your topic and posts will be restored, but it will take a little while, as it requires a bit more work from what I understand.
